description:
Are you prepared for ""the next billion"" internet users, most of whom don't use English as their primary language?

A first look at a full-featured AngularJS module to do just that.

slides: http://doshprompt.github.io/angular-localization-lightning-talk/#/

twitter: https://twitter.com/doshprompt
title: Internationalize AngularJS by Rahul Doshi at ng-europe 2014
